scripts.lint: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx eslint src/**
scripts.lint:fix: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx eslint src/** --fix
scripts.dev: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=development npx nodemon src/index.js
scripts.start: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx forever start -p ./.forever -l ./.forever/forever.log -o ./.forever/app-out.log -e ./.forever/app-err.log --plain src/index.js
scripts.stop: npx cross-env NODE_ENV=production npx forever stopall --killTree
